name: Travelogue (SavaDimitrov)
description:
Follow the life of an artist that got drafted into the military who records their long journey to the front in his journal. You will have to make difficult choices along the way while trying to keep your morale and sanity in check. The level you are about to play happens in the later stages of the game. Your goal is to explore the house, find the hiding person and decide their fate. 

Good Luck and Have Fun!

CONTROLS:

WASD - Movement

CTRL - Go prone (check under beds/ tables)

E - Open Doors, Wardrobes, Cupboards, knock on Walls, pick up Hammer

F - Special interactions (Progression)

R - bring up the House Search Guide list

G or H - make the choice/ quit the Demo
